original_text: Of those still in the city, he took the officer in charge of the fighting men, and five royal advisers. He also took the secretary who was chief officer in charge of conscripting the people of the land and sixty of the conscripts who were found in the city.
korean_text: 또 성 중에서 사람을 사로잡았으니 곧 군사를 거느린 내시 한 사람과 또 성 중에서 만난 바 왕의 시종 다섯 사람과 백성을 징집하는 장관의 서기관 한 사람과 성 중에서 만난 바 백성 육십 명이라

sentences.original_text: Of those still in the city,
sentences.korean_translation: 성읍에 아직 남아 있던 자들 중에서,

sentences.original_text: he took the officer in charge of the fighting men,
who was chief officer in charge of conscripting the people of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 땅의 백성을 징집하는 책임자이며 수석 관리였다.
그리고 예순 명의 징집된 자들도 잡았다.

sentences.original_text: who were found in the city.
